epiworldR 0.0-1
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • SEIRD Model of COVID-19

    Virus

    virus.Rd

    Virus

    virus(name, post_immunity, prob_infecting, prob_recovery, prob_death)

add_virus(m, v, prevalence)

add_virus_n(m, v, prevalence)

virus_set_state(v, init, end, removed)

rm_virus(m, virus_pos)

    Arguments

    name

    of the virus

    post_immunity, prob_infecting, prob_recovery, prob_death

    to be documented

    m

    An object of class epiworld-model.

    v

    An object of class epiworld_virus

    prevalence

    In the case of add_virus, a proportion, otherwise, an integer.

    init, end, removed

    states after acquiring a virus, removing a virus, and removing the agent as a result of the virus, respectively.

    virus_pos

    Positive integer. Index of the virus's position in the model.

    Examples

    mseirconn <- ModelSEIRCONN(
  name                = "COVID-19",
  prevalence          = 0.01, 
  n                   = 10000,
  contact_rate        = 4, 
  incubation_days     = 7, 
  prob_transmission   = 0.5,
  prob_recovery       = 0.99
)

delta <- virus("Delta Variant", 0, .5, .2, .01)
virus_set_state(delta, 1, 3, 3)

add_virus(mseirconn, delta, .3)

run(mseirconn, ndays = 100, seed = 992)
#> _________________________________________________________________________
